column2: Pixel art, 1:1 sprite, extremely simple Age of Empires II villager. Single adult male villager, consistent design across all views: blue tunic, brown belt, tan pants, dark brown boots, light skin, short brown hair. Thick outlines, limited palette, no fine details, readable at a glance. Full body, centered, zoomed to fill most of the frame with a little padding. Transparent background (true alpha), no checkerboard, no white/gray backdrop. No text, no UI, no extra props, no weapons. Front view facing the camera.
